entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:44 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 03:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
